page.title: 11THE SCHOOL
page.content: Our school building is ten years old it will be 11 years old this year.It is quite modern compared with most schools. It has four classrooms, a television, music room and a library. There are 4 teachers and a headmaster who shares class 1 with Mrs. Riley. Mrs. Jeffries is the school secretary. There are 106 children here at present. We start school at 5 years old and leave to go to King Edmund School at 11. My first teacher was Miss Horner and I liked her very much. Our school has a swimminy pool and a large field.There is a courtyard in the middle of the school with a fish pond and a bird table.There is also water and sand in a tub for the little children.The youngest child in the school is Claire Dean and the oldest is Lisa Honeyman.
